name: Lotus: Bloody Palace Demo
description:
Lotus Bloody Palace is a game that draws heavy INSPIRATION from Avatar the Last Airbender and Devil May Cry.

***NOTE: Despite taking heavy inspiration from Avatar the Last Airbender this game is not associated with franchise nor does it intend to infringe on the Last Airbender or Legend of Korra Intellectual Property.  Any similarities (Like the main protagonists mask) are merely placeholders and will be changed later on in production.

This Demo features basic combat. With Combos, and a style system. The player can test their skills on a sandbag.
